attributes.action: Sticter punishiments for a parent who denies access of a child/children
attributes.additional_details: Id like this government to look at how fathers are treated once a relationship breaks down. The law on this matter is stuck in the victorian age an fathers can b treated like they do not matter to their child/children. Stricter punishments for parents who deny access to the other parent an a system that deals an recognises this issue in a quicker time frame.
